page.title: 05 FARMING - Wootton Wawen
page.content:
The area is given over to mixed farming, generally; cereals, cattle and sheep farming are all found. Unlike some of the contiguous areas there is no market gardening.
However, the area is noted for some specialist farming:-
Manor Farm is noted for its {horse-breeding, Park Farm specialises in{pedigree {sheep}while Yew Tree Farm is noted for its {milk cattle. Smith's Farm at Shelfield is especially noted as a{horse stud farm. { { }The markets for the produce are held at Stratford-upon-Avon and Henley-in-Arden.
